diff_hunk:
@@ -124,6 +124,31 @@
     t.integer  "round",                    default: 1
   end
 
+  create_table "events", force: :cascade do |t|
body:
yes, they are supposed to be gone :) 
there's two migrations `remove_job_offers` and `drop_events` which supposedly make sure those tables are dropped. Not sure how this happened ¯_(ツ)_/¯ 
As for fixing it, yes, maybe simply removing the changes to the schema (apart from `state` on the roles table obviously) might do it. Can you give it a try?

body_text:
yes, they are supposed to be gone :)
there's two migrations remove_job_offers and drop_events which supposedly make sure those tables are dropped. Not sure how this happened ¯_(ツ)_/¯
As for fixing it, yes, maybe simply removing the changes to the schema (apart from state on the roles table obviously) might do it. Can you give it a try?
